images.name: myPersistentCloudServer01    Only one image since this is a persistent server
images.hostKeyFingerprint: EMPTY because you have already established dual key communications

matlab.compilerDir: EMPTY since not compiling on cloud
matlab.mcrDir: /usr/local/MATLAB/MATLAB_Compiler_Runtime/v81   or whatever you set up server with

simCores.name: MATLAB_ONLY_2013a  or whatever version you have

config.neuronDir: /home/cc/neuron/nrn    All these paths are up to your installation
